1492540.name: Swing Game
1492540.description:
Welcome to Swing Game, take on the role of a daring adventurer swinging your way through challenging levels! Equipped with a chain for a grapple, you must skillfully attach to random objects and swing from one to another, avoiding the treacherous liquid below. Whether it's bubbling lava, menacing toxic waste, serene water, or mysterious pink fluid, every level presents a new challenge to navigate.

Master the art of swinging as you time your chain attachments with precision, maintaining momentum to reach each new point. Each level offers a unique layout and obstacles, requiring quick reflexes and strategic grappling. Perfect your skills to conquer each level and become a grappling expert!
